name: The #BROKEN Side-Scroller
description:
Broken Brilliance! The greatest game in all of time and space!

Guided by Unity-Chan and the Seven Deities, you must blast your way through all of The Unity Store's free assets as they are frozen in time and distorted in space on the Unity Platformer Demo!

All other games will be OBSOLETE! You will go through your entire Steam collection and hit DELETE! DELETE! DELETE!
